title: Polki Diamond 'Trishul' Haaram with Emerald Pendant - Timeless Elegance
materials: Rhodium Polish. Crafted with authentic Hyderabadi artistry.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a unique 'Trishul' (trident) design motif using triangular Polki diamonds, each framed by a delicate pave setting of smaller diamonds. The necklace culminates in a captivating oval Emerald cabochon pendant, surrounded by more Polki diamonds in a floral halo design. The setting is meticulously crafted to showcase the natural beauty of the Polki diamonds.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (from the diamonds) with a vibrant deep green from the emerald pendant. A classic and regal color combination.
occasions: and other special occasions like Seemantham (శీమంతం) or a grand reception. Its modern design also makes it suitable for sophisticated parties and events.
description: This Haaram is a true statement piece, blending traditional Indian craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique antique charm, while the Emerald pendant adds a touch of regal elegance. Made with high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship, this is an heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. The 'Trishul' design element makes it an auspicious and meaningful gift.
